title: Hello World
description: Write a program that prints 'Hello, World!' to the console.

title: Sum of Two Numbers
description: Write a function that takes two numbers as input and returns their sum.
starterCode:
def add_numbers(a, b):
    return a + b

line = input().strip().split()
a = int(line[0])
b = int(line[1])
print(add_numbers(a, b))

title: Even or Odd
description: Write a program that determines if a number is even or odd.

title: Factorial
description: Write a function to calculate the factorial of a number.

title: Reverse String
description: Write a program that reverses a given string.

title: Find Maximum
description: Write a function that finds the maximum value in a list of numbers.

title: Palindrome Check
description: Write a program that checks if a string is a palindrome.

title: Fibonacci Sequence
description: Write a function that returns the nth Fibonacci number.

title: Prime Check
description: Write a program that checks if a number is prime.

title: String Length
description: Write a program that counts the length of a string without using len().
starterCode:
text = input()
count = 0
for char in text:
    count += 1
print(count)
